text: Alan Slavikovich Chochiyev (; born 7 September 1991) is a Russian football player. He most often plays as an attacking midfielder or left winger. He plays for FC Chayka Peschanokopskoye. ==Club career== He made his professional debut for FC Volgar-Gazprom Astrakhan on 4 April 2011 in a Russian First Division game against FC Nizhny Novgorod. On 29 December 2013, he joined PFC Krylia Sovetov Samara. He made his Russian Premier League debut for Krylia Sovetov on 10 March 2014 in a game against FC Lokomotiv Moscow. On 29 February 2019, he signed with Belarusian club FC Dinamo Minsk until the end of the 2019 season. ==References== ==External links== * Player page on Russian Premier League official website * * Category:1991 births Category:Sportspeople from Vladikavkaz Category:Living people Category:Ossetian people Category:Ossetian footballers Category:Russian footballers Category:Russia youth international footballers Category:Russia under-21 international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Russian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus Category:FC Lokomotiv Moscow players Category:FC Volgar Astrakhan players Category:FC Krylia Sovetov Samara players Category:FC Dinamo Minsk players Category:FC Baltika Kaliningrad players
title: Alan Chochiyev
